description: Flowering Amaryllis plant grown from hybrid seed produced in 1819.
inscription:
Inscribed by the artist, in cursive in black ink, LR: \"E.F. Seedling Amaryllis1819\" / from Vittata & Formosissima / Fairfield May 1824.

Inscribed by the artist in cursive in black ink, LC: seed produced / in 1819

Inventory notations in pencil, LL: P665a; and in pencil, LR: STxx
provenance: Dwight E. and Helen Benton Minnich, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1966.
title: E.F. Seedling Amaryllis 1819
